akn:section.akn:heading: National Nuclear Security Administration authority for urgent nonproliferation activities

akn:content.akn:p: (a) In general Subject to the notification requirement under subsection (b), not more than 10 percent of the total amounts appropriated or otherwise made available in any fiscal year for the nonproliferation programs of the Department of Energy National Nuclear Security Administration may be expended, notwithstanding any other law, for activities described under subsection (b)(1)(B).
